title: I Went To A Remote Scottish Island To Do The Crossword | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh travels to a remote Scottish island to attempt to complete a crossword puzzle. He navigates the challenges of getting to the island and finding a suitable place to sit and complete the puzzle.
summary: Max Fosh travels to a remote Scottish island to do a crossword puzzle.
payoff: The payoff comes from the remote and isolated location of the Scottish island, the absurdity of traveling there just to do a crossword, and the challenges Max faces in trying to find a suitable spot to complete the puzzle.
